properties.validation-details-attribute-name: /Age IS NOT NULL AND /Sexe = 'M' OR /Sexe = 'F' AND /Id_Patient IS NOT NULL

properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO dim_patient (Id_patient, Sexe, Age)
VALUES ('${Id_patient}', '${Sexe}', '${Age}');

gen-table-output-flowfile-on-zero-result.name: gen-table-output-flowfile-on-zero-results
gen-table-output-flowfile-on-zero-result.displayName: Output Empty FlowFile on Zero Results

properties.distinctQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT "Id_patient","Sexe","Age" FROM FLOWFILE WHERE "Id_patient" IS NOT NULL
  AND "Sexe" IS NOT NULL
  AND "Age" IS NOT NULL

attributes-to-ignore-regex.name: attributes-to-ignore-regex
attributes-to-ignore-regex.displayName: Attributes to Ignore by Regular Expression

attributes-to-log-regex.name: attributes-to-log-regex
attributes-to-log-regex.displayName: Attributes to Log by Regular Expression

labels.label: Entrepôt de données (processus pour récupérer les données JSON et les envoyer en requête SQL)
